name: Malwars
description:
In MALWARS you play as an antivirus ship trying to defeat the evil malware dragon. Can you beat him? Find out! 


INSTRUCTIONS 

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Z/Space to shoot/select  

(note: Select only applies to Z) 

There's also dpad controller support for anyone who wants it <3 

Donations appreciated but not required, if you are participating in the jam rating would be awesome, I'll try to rate back <3

Socials: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJBMr8Ag6Fdzx9n7K4UpnLw
